posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Sanders
I'm looking to pick up a low grade Buchner N284 as a type card example for myself.  I'd prefer SGC20 or under or raw and would really prefer a Chicago player. (I like to keep type cards limited to either Cubs or HOF.) Thanks in advance for any help you can provide!

Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
Tim, the following card is yours for $175 shipped. It is in a SGC 20 holder, it wouldn't normally be for sale, but it seems to be just what you are looking for, so I'll make an exception. Let me know if there is interest or not.
-Rhett

[IMG]http://www.geocities.com/rhettmatthew_37/flintn284.JPG[/IMG]

Posted By: Tim Sanders
If you really will part with it I would LOVE to have it!!!!!!!

Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
email me at rhettyeakley@netzero.com and I will get you the details as soon as I hear from you.
-Rhett
